# Overview

This vignette acts as a how-to guide to the primary functions of the package, and its operation.

# Operation

## Setup

1. Load the package

```{r setup}
library(gdrive.automation)
```

2. Try authenticating to the google drive and google sheets. If successful, nothing should happen.

```{r}
gdrv_auth()
```

3. Get initial information on units.

```{r}
db_units <- read_db_units()
```
